= Import DV in 0.6.x =

 * Get the import dvdauthor xml plugin from [http://www.kde-files.org/index.php?xcontentmode=667 kde-files.org].
 * Grab dv:
   {{{
   $ dvgrab --format raw --opendml --size 0
   --autosplit --timestamp video-
   }}}
 * Edit in kino:
   {{{
   $ kino video-*.dv
   }}}
 * Export to mpeg/8-dvd.
 * Import dvdauthor xml to kmediafactory.
